data.content:
noun
plural -ers
[count] :a box that slides into and out of a piece of furniture (such as a desk) and that is used to store things
the top/middle/bottom drawer of the desk/dresser
There are some pens in my desk drawer.
a sock/cash drawer [=a drawer for storing socks/cash]
drawers [plural] old-fashioned + humorous :underwear for the lower part of the body
He stood there in only his drawers. - often used informally in the phrase drop your drawers
At least the doctor didn't make me drop my drawers. [=pull down my underpants]

Danh từ
(cũ)
quần đùi
a pair of drawers
chiếc quần đùi
